com.defano.jmonet.canvas.surface

Interface ScalableScratchDrawable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PaintCanvas
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicPaintCanvas, UndoablePaintCanvas

    public interface ScalableScratchDrawable
    Models a drawable surface with two layers; a canvas, and a temporary "scratch" buffer that can be scaled.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Point convertPointToImage(java.awt.Point p) 
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getCanvasImage()
      Gets the image represented by this drawable; not including any ephemeral changes made to the scratch image.
      double getScale()
      Gets the displayed scale factor of this image.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getScratchImage()
      Gets the "scratch" image associated with this drawable.

    • Method Detail

      • getScratchImage

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage getScratchImage()
        Gets the "scratch" image associated with this drawable. The "scratch" image is a temporary buffer allowing tools to draw on the canvas in a way that doesn't affect the underlying graphic.
        Returns:
        The scratch buffer image.

      • getCanvasImage

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage getCanvasImage()
        Gets the image represented by this drawable; not including any ephemeral changes made to the scratch image.
        Returns:
        The canvas image.

      • getScale

        double getScale()
        Gets the displayed scale factor of this image.
        Returns:
        The displayed scale factor of this image.

      • convertPointToImage

        java.awt.Point convertPointToImage(java.awt.Point p)
